articles.description: Lady Gaga and Adam Driver vanished into character in a first-look image of their upcoming murder biopic House Of Gucci. He plays Maurizio Gucci and she stars as Patrizia Reggiani.
articles.content:
Lady Gaga and Adam Driver vanished into character in a first-look image of their upcoming murder biopic House Of Gucci.
